original_text: It shall be a regular burnt offering throughout your generations at the entrance of the tent of meeting before the Lord, where I will meet with you, to speak to you there.
korean_text: 이는 너희가 대대로 여호와 앞 회막 문에서 늘 드릴 번제라 내가 거기서 너희와 만나고 네게 말하리라

sentences.original_text: It shall be a regular burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 규례대로 드리는 번제가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: at the entrance of the tent of meeting
where I will meet with you
